titleStmt.title: The art of war and the way that it is at present practised in France in two parts : wherein the duties and functions of all the officers of horse and foot, artillery and provisions from the general of the army to the private souldier are treated of ... written in French by Louis de Gaya ... ; translated for publick satisfaction and advantage.
Art de la guerre et la manière dont on la fait à présent. English
titleStmt.author: Gaya, Louis de.
